entry.title: Tonio and Anthony receive the NSF-GRFP

link.title: Tonio and Anthony receive the NSF-GRFP

entry.content: Awesome news: the lab’s first two members, Anthony Garcia and Tonio Chaparro, were awarded the NSF-GRFP! Tonio joined as a technician and Anthony as an undergraduate researcher (now technician). Congrats!
entry.summary: Awesome news: the lab’s first two members, Anthony Garcia and Tonio Chaparro, were awarded the NSF-GRFP! Tonio joined as a technician and Anthony as an undergraduate researcher (now technician). Congrats!

entry.title: New preprint describing PRR Evolution
entry.content: New work is available in BioRxiv: Evolutionary gain and loss of a plant pattern-recognition receptor for HAMP recognition (link). Congrats Simon and Anthony! Adam’s twitter summary is here
entry.summary: New work is available in BioRxiv: Evolutionary gain and loss of a plant pattern-recognition receptor for HAMP recognition (link). Congrats Simon and Anthony! Adam’s twitter summary is here

entry.title: New work in Plant Journal
entry.content: A new publication describing the combined effects of wounding and HAMP treatment is available in The Plant Journal (link). Work was completed at UW with help of Tonio and Natalia!
entry.summary: A new publication describing the combined effects of wounding and HAMP treatment is available in The Plant Journal (link). Work was completed at UW with help of Tonio and Natalia!

entry.title: New review in Plant Cell
entry.content: Simon, Natalia, and Adam have a new long-form review in press at The Plant Cell. Adam’s twitter summary is here. Congrats!
entry.summary: Simon, Natalia, and Adam have a new long-form review in press at The Plant Cell. Adam’s twitter summary is here. Congrats!

entry.title: Rotation students Janet Solano Sanchez and Benjamin Downing

link.title: Rotation students Janet Solano Sanchez and Benjamin Downing

entry.content: Our lab will host two first year students for the Fall quarter, Janet and Ben. Welcome both!!
entry.summary: Our lab will host two first year students for the Fall quarter, Janet and Ben. Welcome both!!

entry.title: The Steinbrenner lab at Plant Bio 21

link.title: The Steinbrenner lab at Plant Bio 21

entry.content:
The lab will be well represented at this year’s ASPB Plant Bio meeting. Our posters and talks are listed below!

Simon Snoeck CS-19-1 - The evolution and ancestral reconstruction of the pattern recognition receptor INR in the Phaseoleae Thursday, July 22, 2021 2:30pm – 2:45pm EDT

Natalia Guayazaán-Palacios Thursday, July 22, 2021 3:00pm – 3:02pm EDT CS-20-3 - Herbivore-specific plant defenses are gated by the circadian clock in Cowpea

Anthony Garcia Friday, July 23, 2021 3:00pm – 3:02pm EDT CS-24-3 - Developing Genetically Encoded Reporters for Plant Immune Recognition of Herbivory

Ava Kloss-Schmidt (poster) Studying Herbivory Defenses in the Absence of a Functional Immune Receptor Through the Development of a Near Isogenic Line of Phaseolus vulgaris

Adam Steinbrenner (poster) Immune Recognition of Chewing Herbivores
entry.summary: The lab will be well represented at this year’s ASPB Plant Bio meeting. Our posters and talks are listed below!

entry.title: Anthony Garcia joins as a Research Technician

link.title: Anthony Garcia joins as a Research Technician

entry.content: Anthony recently graduated from UW and will stay on as a Research Technician in the lab. Congrats Anthony!
entry.summary: Anthony recently graduated from UW and will stay on as a Research Technician in the lab. Congrats Anthony!

entry.title: Happy 2021
entry.content: Happy new year from the lab!
entry.summary: Happy new year from the lab!

entry.title: Receptor work is out in PNAS

link.title: Receptor work is out in PNAS

entry.content:
Our receptor story, previously in bioRxiv, is finally published in PNAS!
“A receptor-like protein mediates plant immune responses to herbivore-associated molecular patterns”
entry.summary: Our receptor story, previously in bioRxiv, is finally published in PNAS! “A receptor-like protein mediates plant immune responses to herbivore-associated molecular patterns”

entry.title: Natalia Joins the Lab
entry.content: Natalia Guayazán-Palacios, rising 2nd year Biology grad, has joined the lab. Welcome Natalia!
entry.summary: Natalia Guayazán-Palacios, rising 2nd year Biology grad, has joined the lab. Welcome Natalia!
